```{r}
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(stargazer)
library(nnet)
library(sandwich)
```



```{r}
data <- read_excel("~/w241/Olive_Oil_Taste_Test/data/final_data/manually_cleaned_data.xlsx")
```

```{r}
summary(data)
```

```{r}
df<-data %>% 
  filter(!is.na(better_smell)) %>%
  mutate(country_of_birth=ifelse(birth_country != 'USA' & birth_country != 'Turkey' , 'Other', birth_country),
         covid=ifelse(covid=='Yes',1,0),
         num_oo_tastings=ifelse(tasting_count==0, 0,1),
         better_smell=ifelse(better_smell=='1','Olive_oil_1',
                             ifelse(better_smell =='2','Olive_oil_2','Neither')),
         more_bitter=ifelse(more_bitter=='1','Olive_oil_1',
                             ifelse(more_bitter =='2','Olive_oil_2','Neither')),
         preferred_olive_oil_2=ifelse(better_taste ==2,1,0),
         second_olive_oil=first_oo)
olive_oil2_df<-df%>%filter(second_olive_oil==1)
olive_oil1_df<-df%>%filter(second_olive_oil==0)
```


```{r}
table(df$num_oo_tastings)
```

```{r}
#Causal model #Subgroup analysis olive oil #2
model1a<-lm(preferred_olive_oil_2 ~ azzignment + second_olive_oil + azzignment*second_olive_oil, data=olive_oil2_df)
model2a<-lm(preferred_olive_oil_2 ~ azzignment + second_olive_oil + azzignment*second_olive_oil + covid + num_oo_tastings, data=olive_oil2_df)
model3a<-lm(preferred_olive_oil_2 ~ azzignment + second_olive_oil + azzignment*second_olive_oil + covid +num_oo_tastings + azzignment*covid + second_olive_oil*covid+ azzignment*num_oo_tastings+ second_olive_oil*num_oo_tastings, data=olive_oil2_df)

 stargazer(
  model1a, model2a,model3a,
   type = 'text',
  se=list(sqrt(diag(vcovHC(model1a))),sqrt(diag(vcovHC(model2a))),sqrt(diag(vcovHC(model3a))))
 )
```
```{r}
#Causal model
model1b<-lm(preferred_olive_oil_2 ~ azzignment + second_olive_oil + azzignment*second_olive_oil, data=olive_oil1_df)
model2b<-lm(preferred_olive_oil_2 ~ azzignment + second_olive_oil + azzignment*second_olive_oil + covid + num_oo_tastings, data=olive_oil1_df)
model3b<-lm(preferred_olive_oil_2 ~ azzignment + second_olive_oil + azzignment*second_olive_oil + covid + num_oo_tastings+ azzignment*covid + second_olive_oil*covid+ azzignment*num_oo_tastings+ second_olive_oil*num_oo_tastings, data=olive_oil1_df)

 stargazer(
  model1b, model2b,model3b,
   type = 'text',
  se=list(sqrt(diag(vcovHC(model1b))),sqrt(diag(vcovHC(model2b))),sqrt(diag(vcovHC(model3b))))
 )
```
```{r}
#Descriptive model
model3<-lm(better_smell ~ azzignment + second_olive_oil + azzignment*second_olive_oil, 
             data=olive_oil2_df %>%
              filter(better_smell !='Neither')%>%
              mutate(better_smell=ifelse(better_smell=='Olive_oil_2',1,0)))
 stargazer(
  model3,
   type = 'text',
  se=list(sqrt(diag(vcovHC(model3))))
 )

 model4<-lm(better_smell ~ azzignment + second_olive_oil + azzignment*second_olive_oil, 
             data=olive_oil1_df %>%
              filter(better_smell !='Neither')%>%
              mutate(better_smell=ifelse(better_smell=='Olive_oil_2',1,0)))
 stargazer(
  model4,
   type = 'text',
  se=list(sqrt(diag(vcovHC(model4))))
 )
```
